ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The proposer Agency - Swargiya Haribhau Kulkarni Vishwast Manch (SHK Trust) is registered after the great personality , Shri Haribhau Kulkarni (1930-1989) had dedicated his whole life to the art and science of running public libraries and spread of â€˜the Culture of Readingâ€™. He is still remembered for his vision, social experiments and extraordinary demonstrative work done at Srirampur Public Library, Tq. Srirampur, District Ahmadnagar of Maharashtra State. His memories are still preserved in the form of the Municipal hall named after him and the public library now converted into E-Library inaugurated at the hands of Bharat Ratna and Ex-President of India Shri APJ Abdul Kalam at Srirampur in 2014. First fifteen years of the Trust was of silent working specially for downtrodden children at schools in Sangali district. A new office at Prachi, Atreya Society, Gokhale Nagar, Pune -16 was established in 2015 for activities of Astron. The activities of the Trust expanded geographically and volumetrically after 2004. Achievements of the proposer agency: Within last three years, after establishment of new department named Astron, the achievements of the proposer agency in the direction of realization the dream portal are as follows: a)Internal team building of passionate amateur astronomers and youngsters b)Conduct of Astronomy related outreach programs for various target groups with different age groups and variety background c)Creating In-house audio visual production expertise d)Networking of enthusiasts to work for spread of Astronomy knowledge e)Visiting and studying online education portals to know their functioning - academic, professional and technical aspect f)Establishing contacts with the stalwarts in the field of Astronomy and science as well as in the social field to get inspiration, vision and guidance g)Production of low cost dummy and pilot short films, audio visual teasers and presentations in the field of Astronomy and social messages h)Networking of likeminded individuals and institutions i)Creation of own website which is in the process of converting into the portal Much is still to be done to fulfill the proposer agencyâ€™s passion of creating a dedicated and unique educational portal for online Astronomy education and look forward to NCSTC for support in this regard. The highlights of the work done by the proposer agency are as follows: 1.Astrotainment is an annual signature program of Astron-SHK Trust entering into the third year of success. The motto of Astrotainment is Approaching Astronomy through Entertainment which is getting an astonishing response of the age groups ranging from 12 to 84 years. 2.Astron also collaborated with University of Lancashire(U.K.), GMRT, IUCCA, NCL Innovation Park, Aakash-Mitra, Navnirmitee, Municipal Science Park and many others for various events related to Astronomy. 6.Production of a character film of a personality dedicated to administration for quality higher education and four social advt films (2014-2016) 7.Astron, a new Department was set up in 2011 which started extension activities relating to Astronomy. The growth of Astron activities and spread proved its quality. Thanks to the young brigade associated with Astron.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Dear friends, Greetings. I am writing to you on behalf of the Ballerina Management Institute Trust. We are actively involved in several philanthropic activities especially revolving around childrenâ€™s education and awareness. We are currently organizing an event to raise funds for the Rural and Tribal children and to support their education needs. I am writing to request you to donate, Cash, Cheques, Demand Draft, a gift certificate or items that can be auctioned off. The proceeds from the auction will be used to support the noble cause of education for the underprivileged. Ballerina Management Institute Trust has adopted around 900 Rural and Tribal children for Educational Awareness Program. Where our dedicated team guides and teaches children to live and not just be educated. Through various interactive projects and workshops on Environment, Biodiversity, solar and wind energy, automobiles, computers, health and hygiene, ecovillages and many more current topics. These programs are conducted by highly qualified professionals and our dedicated team. The Schools are : Name of School Distance from Pune No. of Students 1. YashwantraoMore-PatilAshramshala, Murti-Modhave, Tal-Baramati, Dist-Pune 64 km 310 2. Sharadashram Prathamik Ashramshala Shirgaon, Tal- Maval, Dist- Pune 45 km 260 3. Pune Zilha Parishad Prathamik Shala Virham-Bhalvadi, Tal-Khed, Dist-Pune 100 km 162 Apart from this your organization will also be mentioned in all our promotional materials as sponsors. You will also receive media coverage and there will be a tax deduction applicable on your donation with your consent. Your contribution of this small amount can change the life of the kids by providing them education, clothes and shelter. Many children are waiting for that someone who will realize their dream of education. What means very little to us means a lot to them. Thank you for your time and consideration. Yours truly, Mrs. Ratna S. Joshi Ballerina Management Institute Trust, Pune, India
